SEN_TYPE_TT: Choose between digital sensor DS18B20 and analog sensors PT100x. PT100x sensors require MAX31865 Amplifier
SEN_ADR_TT: DS10B20 sensors identified by an unique address
SEN_NAME_TT: Sensor name as identifyer. Max 15 chars long. No special chars allowed
SEN_TOPIC_TT: MQTT topic used by MQTT Broker for subscribe and publish. Max 20 chars
SEN_OFF1_TT: Difference between measured and defined temperature for calibration. Low measuring point at or nearby 40째C
SEN_OFF2_TT: Difference between measured and defined temperature for calibration. High measuring point at or nearby 78째C
SEN_CBPI_TT: CBPi4 Sensor-ID (optional). Check CBPi4 hardware panel
SEN_EVT_TT: Can this sensor trigger an error event?
ACT_NAME_TT: Actor name as identifyer. Max 15 chars long. No special chars allowed
ACT_MQTT_TT: MQTT topic used by MQTT Broker for subscribe and publish. Max 20 chars
ACT_INV_TT: change High into Low to match On and Off state
ACT_EVT_TT: Switch off this actor in an error event?
IDS_EN_TT: Enables induction cooker GGM IDS2. No other inductions hobs are supported
IDS_TOPIC_TT: MQTT topic used by MQTT Broker for subscribe and publish. Max 20 chars
IDS_PL_TT: In an error event induction power output can be reduced to a predefined level. Function is disabled with 100%
MISC_IMP_TT: upload a backup configuration on device. Attention: this function will overwrite configuration on device
MISC_RES_WLAN: Reset WLAN settings [reboot in access point mode]
MISC_BUZ_TT: Different audio signals help while breewing
MISC_HIRES_TT: Enable high resoution on all sensors. Measurement needs approx 750ms
MISC_SPI_TT: MAX31865 Amplifier SPI is used by analog sensors PT100 and PT1000
MISC_PAGE_TT: Select default display startpage at boot
MISC_MDNS_NAME_TT: mDNS name in your local network e.g http://mqttdevice.local
MISC_NTP_TT: Network time protocoll NTP is used to sync clock. You can define a local NTP Server like europe.pool.ntp.org or fritz.box
MISC_BRO_ADR_TT: MQTT broker IP address. MQTTDevice will subscribe an publish MQTT Topics to this broker
MISC_BRO_PORT_TT: MQTT broker port. Default port is 1883
MISC_EVT_TT: Global switch on or off MQTT error event handling
MISC_MQTT_DELAY_TT: How long should MQTTDevice wait, befor a MQTT error event is triggered?
MISC_ACT_DELAY_TT: How long should MQTTDevice wait, before actors are switched of due to error events
MISC_IDS_DELAY_TT: How long should MQTTDevice wait, before induction power output is reduced to configured level due to error events
MISC_RES_WLAN_TT: Wipe WLAN settings but keep Device configuration. MQTTDevice will reboot in access point mode
MISC_RES_CLEAR_TT: Delete configuration file, wipe all configuration settings but keep WLAN config. MQTTDevice will reboot with defaults. Attention: WLAN settings are not removed
MISC_DEV_TT: Update MQTTDevice with development version. Attention: dev versions often not recommended for brewing
